sentences.chinese: 不執行加油任務的航程爲11，500英里。

sentences.english: Mukherjee has now seen many patients voyage into the night.
sentences.chinese: 現在，穆克吉看見許多癌症病人的航程駛入了黑夜。

sentences.english: Charters of oil-tankers may be by time or for voyage.
sentences.chinese: 油輪的租賃費可以按時間或航程計價。

sentences.english: Columbus kept a careful and detailed chronicle of his voyages.
sentences.chinese: 哥倫布按序仔而詳盡次航程。

sentences.english: The flight lasted four hours from São Paulo to Manaus.
sentences.chinese: 從聖保羅到瑪瑙斯的航程約四個個小時。

sentences.english: Samsara moon, sickle, hammer about the struggle of the voyage.
sentences.chinese: 日月輪迴，鐮刀，鐵錘講述着鬥爭的航程。

sentences.english: Of these, 377 elected to have their vessels repositioned and continued their journey.
sentences.chinese: 其中377人選擇爲船隻補給後繼續航程。

sentences.english: They are single constructions, be still the baronial mark of how-to range ?
sentences.chinese: 他們是單一的建築物，還是指引航程的宏大標誌？

sentences.english: It was a quiet, uneventful flight of less than three hours.
sentences.chinese: 這段不到三個小時的航程一路平安無事。

sentences.english: This time, a teacher embarks on a nine-month around-the-world voyage.
sentences.chinese: 這一次，在九個月環遊了世界的航程老師出發。

sentences.english: The aircraft had an unrefueled range of over 9,000 miles.
sentences.chinese: 這種飛機不執行加油任務的航程超過9，000英里。

sentences.english: How long does the flight take? It's a six-hour flight.
sentences.chinese: 飛機時間有多長？這是6個小時的飛機航程。

sentences.english: These your voysome time of the starship Enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 這是星艦“企業號”的航程。

sentences.english: Does the cruise line offer a five-day package with a two-day stay on sea?
sentences.chinese: 這家郵輪公司有包含二日海上行的五日航程嗎？

sentences.english: The captain victualed his ship for the voyage.
sentences.chinese: 船長爲他的船儲備食物，以備航程中食用。

definition: (of aircraft) to take off and land
to return to the point of departure
early warning aircraft system, e.g. US AWACS
opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret
to form into columns/to organize into teams/formation (of ships or aircraft)
